name: baby ex machina
description:
Controls: 

  • Right click to select an object to modify
  • Adjust the sliders on the left side of the screen to manipulate physics properties
  • Restart a level with the "replay" button on the top-right of the screen
  • Return to the home page with the "home" button on the top-right of the screen

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Matt Bonnecaze - Programming, Design

Jakob Eneman - Level Design

Max Kenny - Level Design

Emily McNee - Sound

Kelly Wang - Art
